title: Hour 2: Michelle Beadle
description:
Le Batard, Stugotz and the crew are joined by Michelle Beadle and we discuss Kanye West's latest controversial comments. Also, we're joined by hurricane specialist & storm surge expert Michael Lowry as we continue our fundraiser for the west coast of Florida.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
